content: Your line is now open. This also is addressed in part, but what you've seen from the FDA regarding optimization of dose and we think that this helps also address the situation where you do have two shots on goal, and essentially you have two places for a patient to get on study with ONC201 and  I'll pass it on to Josh for additional comments.
